name: kanto
description: The region where it all started shares a name with Japan's Kanto region a real-world area located on the island of Honshu

name: johto
description: Johto boasts a traditional Japanese aesthetic and maintains a rivalry with neighboring Kanto

name: Hoenn
description: Hoenn was a more tropical environment reflected in many of the types of Pokémon that could be found throughout trainers' journeys

name: Sinnoh
description: To the north of Hoenn players were introduced to Sinnoh an island region modeled after Japan's own northernmost territory: Hokkaido

name: alola
description: Alola is a unique region in the Pokémon world split into four natural islands and one man-made island which was inspired by Hawaii
